power.title: Adaptive Stratagem
power.fluff: Your companion has the ability and the will, and you provide the plan and the motivation

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target ally gains his or her choice of one of the following two benefits:
► A power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.
► A power bonus to saving throws equal to your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Aid the Injured
power.fluff: Your presence is both a comfort and an inspiration to an ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.
If the target ally is prone, he or she can stand up without spending an action.

power.title: Covering Maneuver
power.fluff: Responding to your expertise, one ally steps in to cover another's recovery

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or an ally in your warlord's aura uses second wind

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering character, and one other ally in your warlord's aura

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The second ally can shift 2 squares as a free interrupt, and then marks one enemy either adjacent to him or her, or in your warlord's aura.
Until the start of his or her next turn, the triggering character has a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the marked enemy.
